summary: This is a brief email communication from July 7, 2019, referencing Jeffrey Epstein's arrest for sex trafficking of minors. It notes that the FBI is leaking the content of the indictment and mentions the involvement of an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the individual arrested for sex trafficking of minors, as reported by The Daily Beast.

events.title: Epstein Arrest for Sex Trafficking
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested for sex trafficking of minors, with the FBI leaking the content of the indictment.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested for sex trafficking of minors.
The FBI was leaking the content of the indictment related to Epstein's arrest.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York was involved in the case.
